modal.gdpr.title: üîê GDPR Privacy Notice
modal.gdpr.data.title: üìù Data Collection
modal.gdpr.data.message: We collect your email address, display name, and profile picture linked to a unique identifier. This data is used solely for authentication and displaying your profile.
modal.gdpr.rights.title: üîß User Rights
modal.gdpr.rights.message: You can modify or delete your personal data at any time. Upon deletion, your unique identifier is retained for technical reasons (Blockchain module), but cannot be traced back to you.
modal.gdpr.cookies.title: üç™ Cookies
modal.gdpr.cookies.message: We use only essential cookies for authentication purposes. No tracking cookies are used.
modal.gdpr.thirdParty.title: ü§ù Third-Party Services
modal.gdpr.thirdParty.message: We do not share your personal data with third parties. If you sign in with a third-party service (e.g., Google), we only receive your unique identifier, email address and display name. We do not store or share any other information obtained through these services.
